alert.note: Alert for Chouteau and Fergus Counties; Hill and Blaine Counties (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 25 at 9:50AM MDT until July 25 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 113 AND 115... * AFFECTED AREA...Hill and Blaine Counties and Chouteau and Fergus Counties. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * IMPACTS...Any new fire starts could be difficult to contain. Isolated thunderstorms are possible in Fergus county this afternoon with a risk of lightning in addition to strong and erratic wind gusts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Chouteau and Fergus Counties; Hill and Blaine Counties
